wikipedia_page.main: Rebecca Strickson is an illustrator and designer. Previously from Grantham, she is now based in Margate, Kent. Strickson was selected to appear in the AOI’s Images 36 Best of British Illustration book in 2012, and was shortlisted twice for the AOI Illustration Awards. She was also a member of the all-woman choir Gaggle from inception until 2014.
